showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
“This is bad…
Just like Corel.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:14}); // {Red XIII}
“This is terrible…
Did Sephiroth do this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // {Yuffie}
“Wow…
I didn't know it was
THIS bad…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:17}); // {Vincent}
“All this happened
while I slept?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:19}); // {Cloud}
“…This is what actually
happened five years ago.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“But…”{PAUSE}“It's probably not me that
will come out of
the Shinra mansion.”{PAUSE}“He's going to try and show us another
stupid illusion.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Zangan
“Hey it's you!
You're still sane, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Zangan
“Then come over here and help me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Zangan
“Hey! What about the other houses?”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Zangan
“Hey! What about the other houses?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Zangan
“I'll check this house.
You check that one over there!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “…Hey, ummm…
Am I going to die?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Zangan
“Hey it's you!
You're still sane, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Zangan
“Then come over here and help me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:22}); // {Tifa}
“I don't want to…watch this.
{Cloud}…Don't watch.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // {Cloud}
“…What's wrong, {Tifa}?
I told you before, right?”{PAUSE}“As long as we know that it's just an
illusion, there's no need to be scared.”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
